short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlights bills being considered by the Utah Legislature to make them easier to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin highlights changes to Utah law on a webpage showing a bill. Click the "toggle highlighting" link toâ€¦ well, toggle the highlighting. That's it!
